sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Baseurl } from '../baseurl' import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const RelatedCourses = ({ code }) => { const [course, setCourse] = useState([]) const [isFetching, setFecthing] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { setFecthing(true) axios.get(`${Baseurl}relatedcourses`, { params: { code: code } }).then((res) => { setFecthing(false) if (res.data) { setCourse(res.data) } }) }, []) return ( <>
Related Courses {isFetching ?
: <> {course.length ? course.filter((item, index) => index < 3).map((item, index) => { return ( <>
Trends
{item.course_title}
₦{item.course_cost} ₦{parseInt(item.course_cost) + parseInt(1500)}
) }).reverse() : No Related Course}}
) } export default RelatedCourses
